CustomField.formula: IF( ((TODAY()>=SBQQ__StartDate__c) && (TODAY() <= SBQQ__EndDate__c)) && ISPICKVAL(Integration_Status__c,'Submitted'), IMAGE("/resource/activeIcons/03_ActiveContact.png", "03 - Active Contact",20,20), IF( ISPICKVAL(Integration_Status__c,'Pending'), 'Pending Integration', IF( ISPICKVAL(Integration_Status__c,'In Error'), 'Integration Error', IF( (TODAY()<=SBQQ__StartDate__c) && ISPICKVAL(Integration_Status__c,'Submitted'), 'Pending', IF( (TODAY()>=SBQQ__EndDate__c) && ISPICKVAL(Integration_Status__c,'Submitted'), 'Expired', 'Not Submitted' ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Status
